sa.आकाशमयस्तेजोमयोऽतेजोमयः: he is the sky, the light, the light
sa.आचारव्यवहारयोरर्थे: for the purpose of conduct and behavior
sa.एतादृशश्चेत्क्षत्रियादिः: if such is the kshatriya and others
sa.एतेषामहमेवान्तिमः: i am the last of these
sa.एवंविधप्रवृत्तेरस्मत्सुखदुःखचिन्ता: such an instinct is our concern for happiness and sorrow
sa.गन्धर्वलोके: in the world of the gandharvas
sa.गभीराध्ययनपूर्णचित्रणात्: from a deeply studied and full depiction
sa.गम्भीरविचारहेतुना: for the sake of serious consideration
sa.गरुडादिशब्दानामत्र: here of the words garuda and others
sa.घण्टावादनसमये: at the time of the bell
sa.जगत्कारणीभूतः: he became the cause of the universe
sa.जगत्तत्वनिरुपणम्: definition of the essence of the universe
sa.जगदुत्पत्तिसन्दर्भे: in the context of the origin of the universe
sa.जगद्बीजस्य: of the seed of the universe
sa.जनभाषाप्रयोगाय: for the use of the public language
sa.जन्मनदितेरुपस्थे: in the presence of the river of birth
sa.जरामरणकृतं: caused by old age and death
sa.जरासन्धभीमयोर्भीषणस्य: of the terrible of jarasandha and bhima
sa.जाठराग्निरूपेण: in the form of stomach fire
sa.जाबालकथादिभिः: by the story of jabala and others
sa.ठाकोरप्रभोर्विश्वासपात्रतया: as a trusted vessel of the thakor lord
sa.तच्चक्षुःश्रोत्रमनोवाणीगम्यम्: that is accessible to the eyes, ears, mind and speech
sa.तटस्थस्वरूपभेदेन: by the difference in neutral form
sa.ततश्चेष्टानिष्टप्राप्तिपरिहारसाधनादर्शना: then, from seeing the means of avoiding the attainment of action and desire, and from knowledge of the meaning of the vedas
sa.नगरवासिभिः: by the inhabitants of the city
sa.नगराबाह्यवर्तिन्यां: in the outskirts of the city
sa.नत्वीश्वराराधनार्थेन: not for the sake of worshiping god
sa.नपुंसकत्वप्राप्तिरूपं: in the form of attaining impotence
sa.नयनानन्दकरम्: it’s a delight to the eye
sa.नरकासुरसंहारानंतरं: after the destruction of the hellish demons
sa.नान्तःशुद्धिर्भवितेति: that there will be no inner purification
sa.भिविष्यति: it will be in the future
sa.भूतार्थकथनमेव: it is the narrative of the past
sa.मित्रवचनात्: from the words of a friend
sa.यथैतत्कूवरस्तक्ष्णायोज्झितो: as this well is sharply thrown
sa.यथोराशिविभूषिते: as in the sign of the zodiac
sa.यदेतत्सदृशास्तिक्तगुलिका: that's a bitter pill like this
sa.योजयित्वाऽऽत्मसमवाप्त्यां: adding to the attainment of self-equality
sa.रक्षिभिरनुसार्यमाणास्ते: they are being followed by the guards
sa.रचनाकालसम्बन्धे: in relation to the time of composition
sa.रत्नप्रदीपनिकरद्युतिभिर्निरस्त: rejected by the brightness of gemstone lamps
sa.रथादिकल्पनया: by the imagination of chariots and others
sa.लाक्षागृहप्रसङ्गः: the case of the lacquer house
sa.लोककल्याणाय: for the welfare of the people
sa.लोककल्याणार्थं: for the welfare of the people
sa.लोकत्रयोपकाराय: for the benefit of the three worlds
sa.लोकमर्यादामरक्षत्: protected the dignity of the world
sa.लोकमुखायोपदर्शितम्: presented to the face of the world
sa.लोकैषणायाश्च: and of the desire for the world
sa.लौकिकैर्गृह्यमाणमुपलभ्याहं: i find myself being taken by the worldly
sa.वक्तुरुपहासायैव: for the sake of the speaker
sa.वज्रसूचीकृत्ताश्वघोषेण: with the sound of a horse listed like a thunderbolt
sa.वणिक्‌सार्थ: for the sake of the merchant
sa.वधूवरयोर्माता: mother of the bride and groom
sa.वयमुदारवृत्तिग्राहिणोऽथवा: we are generous instinct recipients or
sa.वरप्रसादकारणात्: because of the grace of the boon
sa.वर्णाश्रमधर्मप्रतिपादकत्वाच्च: and because it represents the dharma of varnashrama
sa.सकृद्गीताम्भसि: once in the water of the gita
sa.सच्चिदानन्दस्वरूपस्य: of the form of true bliss
sa.सतप्रतिपाद्यविषयमपि: even the subject of true representation
